Description: Sherd from handle of an Attic pottery vase, glazed black.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Prins de Jong considered the fragment to belong to a column-krater
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 63, no. 23)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2071)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2957 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
Miscellaneous number: VII.23 (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
